statements: SELECT * FROM MarketOrderData ORDER BY order_timestamp DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_type, stock_symbol FROM MarketOrderData WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT stock_symbol, order_quantity, order_price FROM MarketOrderData WHERE order_type = 'BUY';
SELECT * FROM MarketOrderData WHERE order_price > 1000 ORDER BY order_quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM MarketOrderData GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT order_id, stock_symbol, order_quantity FROM MarketOrderData WHERE order_price > 1000 ORDER BY order_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM MarketOrderData WHERE order_quantity < 100 ORDER BY order_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT order_id, order_type, order_quantity, order_price FROM MarketOrderData WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY order_timestamp DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT order_id, order_type, order_quantity, order_price FROM MarketOrderData WHERE order_type IN ('BUY', 'SELL') ORDER BY customer_id ASC, order_price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM MarketOrderData WHERE order_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY customer_id, order_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM MarketOrders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_quantity, order_price FROM MarketOrders WHERE order_quantity > 100;
SELECT order_id, order_type, order_timestamp FROM MarketOrders WHERE order_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT order_id, order_type, order_quantity, order_price FROM MarketOrders ORDER BY order_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_type, order_quantity, order_price FROM MarketOrders WHERE order_type LIKE '%Buy%' ORDER BY order_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM MarketOrders WHERE order_type = 'buy' ORDER BY order_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT order_id, order_type FROM MarketOrders WHERE order_quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_quantity ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_price, anomaly_description FROM MarketOrders JOIN Anomalies ON MarketOrders.order_id = Anomalies.order_id WHERE order_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY order_price DESC;
SELECT MAX(order_quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(order_price) AS min_price FROM MarketOrders;

SELECT order_id, COUNT(anomaly_id) AS num_anomalies FROM MarketOrders LEFT JOIN Anomalies ON MarketOrders.order_id = Anomalies.order_id GROUP BY order_id HAVING COUNT(anomaly_id) > 0 ORDER BY num_anomalies DESC;
SELECT * FROM order_data;
SELECT symbol, quantity FROM order_data WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT order_id, order_date, symbol, quantity, price FROM order_data ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, symbol, quantity, price FROM order_data WHERE symbol='AAPL';
SELECT order_id, symbol, price FROM order_data WHERE price < 100.00;
SELECT * FROM order_data ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM order_data GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT trade_date, executed_quantity FROM trade_history WHERE order_id = 100 ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT anomaly_type, detection_date, confidence_level FROM anomaly_detection ORDER BY confidence_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM order_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_orders;
SELECT order_id, stock_symbol, order_price FROM market_orders WHERE order_quantity > 100;
SELECT trader_name, trader_rating FROM traders WHERE trader_location='New York';
SELECT * FROM analysis_results ORDER BY result_timestamp DESC;
SELECT a_type, a_timestamp FROM anomalies WHERE a_nomaly_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM market_orders ORDER BY order_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trader_name, trader_rating, trader_location FROM traders WHERE trader_rating > 4 AND trader_location = 'New York';
SELECT stock_symbol, SUM(order_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM market_orders GROUP BY stock_symbol ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

SELECT * FROM traders JOIN market_orders ON traders.trader_id = market_orders.order_id WHERE traders.trader_name LIKE '%John%' AND market_orders.order_price > 100 ORDER BY market_orders.order_timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT a_type, COUNT(*) AS count_anomalies FROM anomalies GROUP BY a_type HAVING count_anomalies > 5 ORDER BY count_anomalies DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketOrderData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, quantity, price FROM MarketOrderData WHERE side = 'BUY' ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT order_id, timestamp, symbol, quantity FROM MarketOrderData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM TradingPatterns WHERE pattern_name LIKE '%Trend%' AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT model_name, model_type, hyperparameters FROM AIModels WHERE training_data->>'algorithm' = 'Random Forest' ORDER BY model_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM MarketOrderData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, quantity, price FROM MarketOrderData WHERE side='SELL' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM TradingPatterns WHERE LENGTH(description) > 50;
SELECT * FROM Anomalies WHERE anomaly_type LIKE '%pattern%';
SELECT model_name, model_type, training_data, hyperparameters FROM AIModels LIMIT 5;
